item.title: RedLineStealer LNK+Powershell+HTA
item.description: Executive Summary Technical Analysis Introduction Down the chain, the LNK Down the chain, the HTA Down the chain, the Powershell Down the chain, the Payload Conclusion Appendices Appendix A - Payload Hashes: Credits Executive Summary Lately there has been a rise in the abuse of .lnk files to download additional payloads or execute them. In this report a RedLineStealer campaign is analyzed. Technical Analysis Introduction The following is the execution chain in order:
